00048 int ec_reg_request_init(
00049         ec_reg_request_t *reg, 
00050         size_t size 
00051         )
00052 {
00053     if (!(reg->data = (uint8_t *) kmalloc(size, GFP_KERNEL))) {
00054         EC_ERR("Failed to allocate %zu bytes of register memory.\n", size);
00055         return -ENOMEM;
00056     }
00057 
00058     INIT_LIST_HEAD(&reg->list);
00059     reg->mem_size = size;
00060     memset(reg->data, 0x00, size);
00061     reg->dir = EC_DIR_INVALID;
00062     reg->address = 0;
00063     reg->transfer_size = 0;
00064     reg->state = EC_INT_REQUEST_INIT;
00065     return 0;
00066 }
00067

00072 void ec_reg_request_clear(
00073         ec_reg_request_t *reg 
00074         )
00075 {
00076     if (reg->data) {
00077         kfree(reg->data);
00078     }
00079 }

00099 void ecrt_reg_request_write(ec_reg_request_t *reg, uint16_t address,
00100         size_t size)
00101 {
00102     reg->dir = EC_DIR_OUTPUT;
00103     reg->address = address;
00104     reg->transfer_size = min(size, reg->mem_size);
00105     reg->state = EC_INT_REQUEST_QUEUED;
00106 }
00107 
00108 /*****************************************************************************/
00109 
00110 void ecrt_reg_request_read(ec_reg_request_t *reg, uint16_t address,
00111         size_t size)
00112 {
00113     reg->dir = EC_DIR_INPUT;
00114     reg->address = address;
00115     reg->transfer_size = min(size, reg->mem_size);
00116     reg->state = EC_INT_REQUEST_QUEUED;
00117 }
